title: The WORST Pro Controller
description: Where does the PS5 Dual Sense Edge rank compared to the Xbox Elite 2? The WORST Tech at Home Depot:  I Gamed in Sony's PlayStation car:  I Got SCAMMED on Etsy:  Sony is in TROUBLE:  You're Too POOR For These:   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Matt:  Instagram:   Produced by Kinsey Lynaugh  Edited by Aron Goodall:   Chapter Titles ------------------------------- 0:00 Hello and Welcome 0:19 Razer Wolverine V1 1:28 Switch Pro Controller 2:18 Scuf Instinct Pro 3:34 Xbox Elite Controller Series 1 4:40 Thrustmaster E Swap S 5:18 Thrustmaster E Swap X 6:25 Asus ROG Raikiri Pro 7:24 Razer Wolverine V2 Pro 8:33 Power A Fusion 9:34 Scuf Reflex Pro (We lost it) 10:14 PDP BFG Victrix Pro 11:14 Scuf Impact Pro (PS4) 11:50 Dualsense Edge 12:47 Austins a clown 13:58 Xbox Elite Series 2 15:03 What do you think?
